formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: P_2 = P_1 + \tfrac{1}{2}\rho\left(v_1^2 - v_2^2\right) + \rho g \left(z_1 - z_2 - h_L\right)
formulas.raw: P_2 = P_1 + \tfrac{1}{2}\rho\left(v_1^2 - v_2^2\right) + \rho g \left(z_1 - z_2 - h_L\right)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: v_2 = \sqrt{\,v_1^2 + 2g\!\left( \frac{P_1 - P_2}{\rho g} + z_1 - z_2 - h_L \right)}
formulas.raw: v_2 = \sqrt{\,v_1^2 + 2g\!\left( \frac{P_1 - P_2}{\rho g} + z_1 - z_2 - h_L \right)}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: P_2 = P_1 + \tfrac{1}{2}\rho\left(v_1^2 - v_2^2\right) + \rho g (z_1 - z_2 - h_L)
formulas.raw: P_2 = P_1 + \tfrac{1}{2}\rho\left(v_1^2 - v_2^2\right) + \rho g (z_1 - z_2 - h_L)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Core energy balance with head loss: $$ \frac{P_1}{\rho g} + \frac{v_1^2}{2g} + z_1 \;=\; \frac{P_2}{\rho g} + \frac{v_2^2}{2g} + z_2 \;+\; h_L $$ Rearranged to solve for commonly needed unknowns: $$ P_2 = P_1 + \tfrac{1}{2}\rho\left(v_1^2 - v_2^2\right) + \rho g \left(z_1 - z_2 - h_L\right) $$ $$ v_2 = \sqrt{\,v_1^2 + 2g\!\left( \frac{P_1 - P_2}{\rho g} + z_1 - z_2 - h_L \right)} $$ $$ z_2 = \frac{P_1 - P_2}{\rho g} + \frac{v_1^2 - v_2^2}{2g} + z_1 - h_L $$

sources.label: Wiley â€” Fundamentals of Fluid Mechanics
